We have adopted the establishment of a supreme Shari'ah Supervisory Board for the banking and finance business in the UAE, setting standards and supervising the Sharia committees of Islamic banks and financial institutions

The Authority has a major task in developing the work of the Sharia bodies in the financial and banking institutions in the UAE and strengthening the position of the State as a global Islamic financial center
